T02D3525:168a-1: kalpo kta bidhi n'a s'i ta m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
T02D3525:168a-3: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho ga 'od zer can dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3525:168a-4: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3525:168a-5: dang po re zhig rang gi snying gar zla ba
T02D3525:168a-6: la mam yig dkar po'i 'od zer gyis bcom ldan
T02D3525:168a-7: 'das ma gdan drangs te nye bar spyod pa sna
T02D3525:168a-8: tshogs pas mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs
T02D3525:168a-9: pa byas nas tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms te
T02D3525:168a-10: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba
T02D3525:168a-11: a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod nas bam yig las skyes
T02D3525:168a-12: pa'i sna tshogs padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3525:168a-13: la slar yang mam yig dkar po yongs su gyur
T02D3525:168a-14: pa las 'od zer can kun dang zla ba'i 'od
T02D3525:168a-17: zhabs bzhi pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis bsam par bya'o //
T02D3525:168a-18: de la zhal gyi gtso bo sku'i mdog lta bu /
T02D3525:168a-20: zhal g-yon pa phag zhal dmar po /
T02D3525:168a-22: dbu'i steng du zhal ser po rin po che sna
T02D3525:168a-23: tshogs pa sa brgyan pa'i zung phud gsum pa ral
T02D3525:168a-25: phyag g-yas pa lnga rnams na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D3525:168a-29: khab rnams phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D3525:168a-30: phyag g-yon pa lnga rnams na /
T02D3525:168a-31: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang gzhu dang /
T02D3525:168a-32: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga dang /
T02D3525:168a-33: zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D3525:168a-34: skud pa rnams phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D3525:168a-35: rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa'i rna rgyan dang /
T02D3525:168a-38: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba'i ska rags dang /
T02D3525:168a-39: gos kyis sku la brgyan pa /
T02D3525:168a-40: lang tsho gzhon zhing sha 'gag gi stong g-yogs dkar po can /
T02D3525:168b-0: @168b mchod rten gyi nang du bzhugs shing phag bdun gyi shing rta la bzhugs pa /
T02D3525:168b-4: tshangs pa rnams zhabs bzhis mnan pa /
T02D3525:168b-5: de'i yang shing rta'i dbus su gnas pa'i chu srin
T02D3525:168b-6: mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma de yang sku mdog
T02D3525:168b-7: nag mo phag gi zhal can ma /
T02D3525:168b-9: sdigs mdzub dag gis g-yas dang /
T02D3525:168b-11: g-yas phyogs na bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan te /
T02D3525:168b-12: de yang phag zhal dmar mo phyag bzhi pa lcags kyu dang /
T02D3525:168b-13: kha bdag phyag g-yas pa gnyis na'o //
T02D3525:168b-14: zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D3525:168b-15: skud pa dag phyag g-yon pa gnyis na'o //
T02D3525:168b-16: mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o zhes so //
T02D3525:168b-17: g-yon phyogs na rje btsun ma gzhan te /
T02D3525:168b-18: de yang sku mdog dmar mo phag pa'i zhal can no //
T02D3525:168b-19: rna ba'i rtsar bkang ba'i gzhu dang /
T02D3525:168b-22: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga rnams g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D3525:168b-23: sna tshogs pa'i na bzas brgyan pa'i zhes te /
T02D3525:168b-24: shing rta 'dren pa'i phag gi 'og na nyi ma
T02D3525:168b-25: la sogs pa'i gza' dgu dang nye bar 'tshe ba'i
T02D3525:168b-26: nad kyi tshogs lhung nas mi gzugs kyi zhi zhing
T02D3525:168b-27: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das ma bsams nas /
T02D3525:168b-28: snying gar zla ba la mam yig las byung ba'i
T02D3525:168b-29: 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gdan
T02D3525:168b-30: drang ste / dbang bskur blangs shing /
T02D3525:168b-31: rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D3525:168b-32: de nas snying ga'i sa bon las phreng ba'i rnam
T02D3525:168b-33: pa lta bu'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams kha nas
T02D3525:168b-36: kha nas slar yang lte ba la sogs par 'khor
T02D3525:168b-37: lo 'khor ba'i rim pa bzhin du sngags bzlas par
T02D3525:168b-38: bya'o // mthar gsum gyi de bzhin nyid kyang yid kyis bya'o //
T02D3525:168b-39: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D3525:168b-40: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3525:168b-41: rang gi sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs la zas
T02D3525:168b-42: la sogs pa thams cad la rjes su gnas par
T02D3525:168b-43: bya'o // skyon yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod la ci bder gnas par bya'o //
